entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
